TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser extends System.Web.Security.MembershipUser

summary.span: 公開及更新 Active Directory 資料存放區中儲存的成員資格使用者資訊。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 物件用來代表 Active Directory 成員資格資料存放區中的單一成員資格使用者。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store. 它會公開成員資格使用者的電子郵件地址，例如的相關資訊，並提供成員資格使用者，例如能夠變更或重設其密碼的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. 每當應用程式設定為使用 Active Directory 資料存放區時，將會傳回應用程式的成員資格提供者的物件。An object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store. 您可以設定的應用程式中使用不同的資料存放區，或在使用多個資料存放區的應用程式，您可以參考的基底類別， 。In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, . 因為物件未實作並屬性，您必須準備好處理這些成員會在存取時，會擲回物件。Because the object does not implement the and properties, you must be prepared to handle the that is thrown when these members are accessed on an object. 類別會實作所使用的內部最佳化類別之屬性更新發生時呼叫的數目降到方法。The class implements internal optimizations used by the class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the method. 它也會序列化代表 (用於屬性)，讓物件可以序列化及還原序列化，而不擲回例外狀況。It also serializes the representation (available in the property) so that an object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions. A物件由並方法或做為一部分所傳回， ，和方法。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. 物件所方法，當您想要更新現有的成員資格使用者的資訊。An object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. 屬性會對應到 Active Directory 屬性。 properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes. 下表列出屬性和其預設屬性對應。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. |屬性Property|預設目錄屬性Default directory attribute|可以對應嗎？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||`securityIdentifier`|否No| ||`userPrincipalName`|是，但必須是 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||`comment`|否No| ||`whenCreated`|否No| ||`mail`|是，但必須是 Unicode String 型別的單一值屬性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||N/An/a|不支援。Not supported by .| ||N/An/a|不支援。Not supported by .| ||`pwdLastSet`|否No| ||none，但如果您使用的密碼重設或重建的問題和答案安全性必須對應到一個屬性。none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|是，但必須是 Unicode String 型別的單一值屬性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||`User-Account-Control` (AD)`User-Account-Control` (AD)

`mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)`mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|否No| ||從計算`lockoutTime`和 AD 的鎖定持續時間 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (Windows Server 2003 上的 AD)`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|否No| ||如果因嘗試太多次不正確密碼鎖住，則會傳回鎖定時間屬性。If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果被鎖住，因為太多的不正確的密碼解答嘗試，所定義的屬性中儲存的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`會傳回。If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果鎖定由於不正確的密碼和太多的錯誤密碼嘗試，則會傳回最新的日期/時間值。If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

若該帳戶並未鎖定，則傳回 1/1/1753 SQL 相容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|否No| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可能會從多個成員資格資料存放區傳回使用者資訊的網頁上的物件。The following code example demonstrates using properties on the object on a Web page that may return user information from multiple membership data stores. 因為物件之下成員資格提供者所傳回的物件未實作和屬性，程式碼會先檢查傳回的成員資格的使用者物件的類型在顯示這些屬性的內容之前的提供者。Because the object that underlies the object returned by the membership provider does not implement the and properties, the code first checks the type of the user object returned from the membership provider before displaying the contents of those properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/CS/admuClassExamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/VB/admuClassExamplevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新物件不會新增新的成員資格使用者物件的成員資格資料存放區。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要新增新的成員資格使用者的成員資格資料存放區，請使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 請注意，方法會傳回加入至資料存放區的成員資格使用者的物件。Note that the method returns an object for the membership user added to the data store. 通常用於應用程式程式碼中建構物件方法，雖然您也可以傳遞從傳回的物件， ， ， ，或方法以及方法。 objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the method, although you can also pass an object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 物件通常也會建構的成員資格提供者實作， ， ， ， ，和方法。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the , , , , , and methods.

summary.span: 取得或設定成員資格使用者的應用程式特定資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.

value.span: 目錄屬性中儲存之 Active Directory 成員的特定應用程式資訊。

span.span: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the directory attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來儲存成員資格使用者特有應用程式的自訂資訊。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可儲存的資訊量`Comment`屬性由此。The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an is defined by the . 屬性會對應到`Comment`預設 Active Directory 屬性。The property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute. 這個屬性不能重新對應至另一個屬性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

span.span: Gets or sets the email address of the membership user.

span.span: The email address of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應到`Mail`directory 屬性。The property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute. 這個屬性都可以重新對應的 Web.config 檔案中設定`attributeMapUserName`屬性中[（ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的設定檔的 providers 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)設定檔的項目。This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.

value.span: 如果使用者可以進行驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的成員資格使用者已在呼叫期間由。The value for a membership user is checked during the call to by the . 如果屬性會傳回`false`，則方法會傳回`false`即使提供的使用者名稱和密碼皆正確。If the property returns `false`, the method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct. 屬性會對應到其中一個下列的 Active Directory 屬性。The property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes. ||| |-|-| |Active DirectoryActive Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory 應用程式模式Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 這個屬性不能重新對應至另一個屬性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援屬性類別。The property is not supported by the class. 嘗試取得或設定值永遠會擲回。Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷成員資格使用者的基礎類型是否，並避免擲回存取屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is , and to avoid throwing a for accessing the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 取得成員資格使用者之 Active Directory 資料存放區的使用者識別項。

span.span: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.

value.span: 成員資格使用者之 Active Directory 資料存放區的使用者識別項。

span.span: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開從資料來源以一般方式型別為成員資格的識別項`object`。The property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`. 類別可以轉換成物件。The class can be cast as a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示屬性，以 Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) 格式，藉由將它轉換成物件。The following code example displays the property in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format by converting it to a object. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic.
